EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal@NY (GigaOm Cancel)_Q115.Email Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Save your trip to NYC - Big Data & Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GigaOm Structure Big Data cancelled. No Problem. Pivotal NYC office Open to You!
Our valued industry colleagues, GigaOM, have cancelled Structure Big Data this Wed-Thurs. We were looking forward to this flagship industry event and its cancellation has left a hole in all our schedules.
We'd like offer you a chance to salvage some of the week and join us at Pivotal for a day of Big Data information sharing and fellowship as we tackle OSS, data science and the latest in IT transformation.
Please join Pivotal product experts, data science and industry guests at this informative session.
Date: Thursday, March 19, 2015 - 1:30 PM to 6:00 PM Location: 625 Avenue of the Americas. New York, NY 10011
Agenda: 1:30 PM - Enterprise Transformation 2:30 PM - Data Science vs. Data Engineer 3:30 PM - Open Data Platform 4:15 PM - Data Lake 5:00 PM - Cocktails, Snacks and March Madness
We are looking forward to seeing you on Wednesday. Please RSVP here <http://connect.pivotal.io/Global_Event_PivotalNY-GigaOm-Cancel_Q115_Register.html> to confirm your attendance.
